<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Lost in the Crowd](/Feats.aspx?ID=918) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 131 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Lion Blade](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=22)

**Prerequisites**
[Lion Blade Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=917)

</column>

---

You’ve learned how to move as one with crowds and hide among them, vanishing into a busy street in the blink of an eye. You move at full Speed in crowds and can use cover from crowds to Hide and Sneak, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus on your Stealth checks when in a crowd of at least 10 creatures and a +4 circumstance bonus on your Stealth checks when in a crowd of at least 100 creatures.

<title level="2">Lost in the Crowd leads to...</title>
[Crowd Mastery](/Feats.aspx?ID=919)
name: Lost in the Crowd
